subtitle: Built for developers who demand speed, control, and seamless integrations.

features.title: Interactive Terminal Console
features.description: Monitor like a developer with our built-in command-line interface. Real-time website management with commands like websites add, websites list, websites check. Command history and auto-completion for power users.

features.title: 1-Minute Monitoring Intervals
features.description: 5x faster than Pingdom with 1-minute check intervals vs their 5-minute minimum. Adaptive timeout system that adjusts based on website performance. Smart change detection - only alerts when status actually changes.

features.title: Webhook Integrations
features.description: Get alerts where your team already is. Integrate with Discord, Slack, Telegram, Notion, Monday, N8N, and more. Real-time alerts sent directly to your existing workflows. No need to set up separate notification systems.

features.title: Monitor Multiple Sites
features.description: Track up to 10 websites for free. Perfect for personal projects, portfolios, and small businesses.

features.title: Simple Setup
features.description: No complex configuration needed. Just add your website URLs and start monitoring immediately.

features.title: Developer-First Design
features.description: I'm trying to build this for developers, so the Terminal interface, API access (coming soon), and webhook integrations make it perfect for automation and existing workflows.
